alert.note: Alert for Kosciusko; Marshall (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 11:59PM EDT until July 29 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Kosciusko County in north central Indiana... East central Marshall County in north central Indiana... * Until 100 AM EDT. * At 1159 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bourbon, or 11 miles west of Warsaw, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Warsaw, Bourbon, Milford, Etna Green, Leesburg, Little Chapman Lake, Oswego, Monoquet, Hoffman Lake, Atwood, Hastings, Big Chapman Lake, and Clunette. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
